title: Slow cooker massaman curry
description: A fragrant and filling southern Thai dish with peanuts and potatoes - a delicious alternative to Thai green curry.
ingredients: 800g/1lb 12oz boned lamb shoulder or beef shin, cut into matchbox-size pieces
small bunch fresh coriander, stalks finely chopped
5cm/2in piece fresh root ginger, finely grated
1 tbsp fish sauce, plus extra to taste
handful roasted unsalted peanuts, roughly chopped, to serve
